name: NINJA OF NARA
description:
A CUTE NINJA GAME OF IT'S OWN KIND! ENJOY THE BEAUTIFUL STORY AND SCENERY.

STORY -:

DEEP  DOWN IN THE HIDDEN VALLEY OF A NINJA VILLAGE, THERE LIVES A LEGENDARY NINJA. HIS NAME IS HAYATO KOHAN. SERVING UNDER THE GUIDANCE OF GRANDMASTER YOSHIE, HE HAS BROUGHT PEACE TO THEIR VILLAGE BUT NINJAS OF OTHER VILLAGES HAD INVADED HIS VILLAGE AND STOLE 9 SECRET SCROLLS OF THE VILLAGE. IT IS NOW TIME FOR OUR HERO TO BRING THEM BACK.

SPECIALITY AND FEATURES -:

YOUR NINJA HAS BEEN BLESSED WITH -:

UNLIMITED HEALTH

UNLIMITED SHURIKENS

NO NEED TO GET ANYTHING FROM STORE

EVERYTHING HAS BEEN  PROVIDED WITHIN.

VERY REASONABLE PRICE!
